snippet: Newt Gingrich's comments were the latest in a string of hawkish statements that some Republican presidential candidates have used in talking about Iran.
abstract: Newt Gingrich's comments were the latest in a string of hawkish statements that some Republican presidential candidates have used in talking about Iran.
lead_paragraph: 3:07 p.m. | Updated CLEVELAND -- Newt Gingrich asserted on Wednesday that an Iranian nuclear attack on the United States was "a real danger" and that it could kill and wound hundreds of thousands of Americans.

headline.main: Gingrich Warns of Iranian Nuclear Attack

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
